reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the tast
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the taste and found it effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle and natural
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouthwash because it uses tea tree oil, which is reportedly very natural and healing. Although most people use mouthwash to freshen their breath, I purchased this product with the intent to not only freshen my breath, but also to see if the tea tree oil would heal any potential cavities and kill any bacteria not visible to the eye. I am about halfway done with the bottle; it has a very subtle flavor, Nothing too strong. I have yet to note any other differences however, I most likely would repurchased under the grounds that I am trying to live a more holistic lifestyle and use less toxic chemicals in my personal hygiene products. I do, however, wish that this was more affordable for the amount that you receive. I understand more pure, minimally processed products will cost more. I am just accustomed to buying a huge bottle of Listerine for half the price that’s the only con that is unsettling. However, as far as quality, If I note any benefits through long-term use, I will provide an update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice replacement to the Jason brand
reviews.reviewText: Nice replacement to the jason brand since theyre going cheaper due to inflation, only complaint is the size to price is bad but not horrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the only thing that helps my canker sores
reviews.reviewText: This tea tree mouthwash (as well as an identical one from Trader Joe's that they don't carry anymore) has proven to be the only thing that clears up my canker sores, which are raw patches inside the mouth that seem to flare up during the female hormone cycle. Not to be confused with cold sores, which are scabs on top of the lip - I'm talking about sores inside the mouth that cannot be seen unless you open your mouth and pull down your lip. I think it must be a hereditary problem as it affects my mother and daughter as well. Sometimes, I get flare ups so bad they go all the way around inside my mouth following the tooth line and make eating a chore.I was so happy I found this formula to be like the one from Trader Joe's which I had been missing for years after they stopped carrying it. This is a tiny bottle, but I found it doesn't take much to help, nor do I need to use it daily. I find relief within a day of using it on my canker sores, and otherwise use it a couple times a week. As a bonus, I had a patch of gingivitis that wouldn't budge for anything. It was red for at least a year and sometimes bled. It went away within a month after I started using this mouthwash.I am so happy to have found an effective mouthwash again and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the taste of this mouthwash, not too sweet or strong with a pleasant taste. My mistake was getting a small bottle, I should have paid better attention to the size. But I would buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Compared to other mouthwashes there isn't much in this bottle and it's easy to go through it too fast. While I expect to pay more for better quality this just isn't cutting it. It doesn't work well enough to make up for the cost per oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the refreshing flavor! Just a cupful in my Waterpik reservoir along with a little food grade hydrogen peroxide has both my hygienist and I very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans and disinfects
reviews.reviewText: We use this daily. Our son had his wisdom teeth removed and used this product, helped him heal too!
One of the very few mouthwashes without fake sugar to which i am allergic. Very expensive, but tastes ok and works.

This product actually works. Unlike most mouthwashes this stuff actually does kill bacteria and restores your infected gums. While I had a bad tooth and I had to wait to have it pulled do to lockdown this product saved me. It kept the tooth from getting infected and kept the pain at a minimum. Thankfully the dentist eventually reopened from lockdown and pulled my tooth. Now I will always use this.

reviews.reviewText: Bon produit à associer avec un brossage régulier de la gencive vers les dents ,utilisez également des brossettes puis ce bain de bouche pour finir . Bon produits naturel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash left my mouth feeling clean and fresh for several hours. It's quite strong so you would need to use sparingly so that makes it better value for money.
